message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is way too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $6,000 for it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $12,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for the value this product brings.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me in the middle, but $12,000 is still too high for my budget. I could do $8,000.  That's the absolute highest I can go.

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to think about my own needs. I'll meet you at $9,000. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
